purpleculture_pinyin:
kuì
to be dispersed; to break down; to fester; to ulcerate
быть рассредоточенным; сломаться; гноиться; изъязвлять
rtega_mnemonic:
潰潰RS
溃溃		flooding river, militarily defeat, crush, smash
  • expensive 貴 water 氵: river overflowing it's banks thus crushing an army and leading to military defeat
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 溃)
Pictophonetic: 貴 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
潰瘍 [ kuì yáng ]: ulcer; to ulcerate
潰敗 [ kuì bài ]: utterly defeated; routed; crushed; to collapse (of army)
潰爛 [ kuì làn ]: to fester; to ulcerate

    • 貴 [ guì ] expensive, costly; valuable, precious
heisig_chinese_memo: When pipes burst it's an unfortunately expensive use of water.
heisig_constituent: defile, water, water droplets, water pistol, precious, Takanohana, purse, in, one, floor, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: Man continues to defile precious water and it may prove to be his downfall (Think of Exxon, BP, etc.).
koohiiStory2: ...Faramir and Frodo watched the tiny creature far below. "Shall we shoot him?" Faramir asked. "This Gollum has defiled the waters of the Forbidden pond, looking for his Precious, and for that the penalty is death"...
kunYomi: つぶ.す、つぶ.れる、つい.える
jp_example_words:

潰れる(つぶれる): be smashed, go bankrupt
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 漬 (つける、シ мариновать).
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 十 (десять), 口 (рот), 汁 (суп), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: kuì: (графема) прорывать (плотину); вырваться из окружения; понести поражение; разбежаться, распасться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: something precious (貴) in the water (氵) will be destroyed
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When pipes burst it's an expensive waste of water.
humanum_full_description_en:
The sound from " water " to " expensive " means that the water breaks through the embankment. "Shuowen": "Leakage. From the water, the sound is precious." "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yushang": "Chuan Chuan collapses and hurts more."

" Rout " can mean defeat, escape and disorganization. "Zuo Zhuan‧ Four Years of Gong Xi": "Qi Hou invaded Cai with the tutelage of the princes, Cai Kui."

" Break " also means the appearance of hydration. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Gao Tang Fu"": "It's raging and silent, and it merges into it."

" Break " also means turbulent flow and overflow. "The Epitaph of Jin Gong, Doctor Guanglu" by Shizhen of the Qing Dynasty: "The river course was badly bad. From below Xiaoxian, the yellow water collapsed four times and never returned to the sea."
humanum_short_description_en: The sound from " water " to " expensive " means that the water breaks through the embankment.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「貴」聲，表示水沖破堤防。《說文》：「漏也。从水，貴聲。」《國語‧周語上》：「川壅而潰，傷人必多。」

　　「潰」可表示敗逃、散亂。《左傳‧僖公四年》：「齊侯以諸侯之師侵蔡，蔡潰。」

　　「潰」也表示水合流之貌。《文選‧宋玉〈高唐賦〉》：「濞洶洶其無聲兮，潰淡淡而並入。」

　　「潰」還表示亂流、漫溢。清王士禛《光祿大夫靳公墓志銘》：「時河道大壞，自蕭縣以下，黃水四潰，不復歸海。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「貴」聲，表示水沖破堤防。

從「 水 」，「 貴 」聲，表示水沖破堤防。《說文》：「漏也。从水，貴聲。」《國語‧周語上》：「川壅而潰，傷人必多。」 「 潰 」可表示敗逃、散亂。《左傳‧僖公四年》：「齊侯以諸侯之師侵蔡，蔡潰。」 「 潰 」也表示水合流之貌。《文選‧宋玉〈高唐賦〉》：「濞洶洶其無聲兮，潰淡淡而並入。」 「 潰 」還表示亂流、漫溢。清王士禛《光祿大夫靳公墓志銘》：「時河道大壞，自蕭縣以下，黃水四潰，不復歸海。」
The sound from " water" to " expensive" means that the water breaks through the embankment. "Shuowen": "Leakage. From the water, the sound is precious." "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yushang": "Chuan Chuan collapses and hurts more." " Rout" can mean defeat, escape and disorganization. "Zuo Zhuan‧ Four Years of Gong Xi": "Qi Hou invaded Cai with the tutelage of the princes, Cai Kui." " Break" also means the appearance of hydration. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Gao Tang Fu"": "It's raging and silent, and it merges into it." " Break" also means turbulent flow and overflow. "The Epitaph of Jin Gong, Doctor Guanglu" by Shizhen of the Qing Dynasty: "The river course was badly bad. From below Xiaoxian, the yellow water collapsed four times and never returned to the sea."

潰字的基本解释

潰
kuì

潰
huì
均见“溃”。

潰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuì］
［《廣韻》胡對切，去隊，匣。］
“溃1”的繁体字。
(1)水冲破堤防。
(2)乱流；漫溢。
(3)水合流。
(4)败逃，散乱。
(5)毁坏。
(6)盛怒貌。
(7)烂。
(8)通“遂”。达到。

潰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潰； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页650第23
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡對切，音繪。【前漢·文帝紀】大水潰出。【註】旁決曰潰。　又亂也。【詩·大雅】潰潰回遹。　又散也。【左傳·文三年】民逃其上曰潰。【公羊傳】國曰潰，邑曰叛。　又遂也。【詩·小雅】是用不潰于成。　又怒也。【詩·邶風】有洸有潰。【韓詩】潰潰，不善之貌。　又水相交過曰潰。【宋玉·高唐賦】潰淡淡而?入。　又潰濩，水勢相激貌。【郭璞·江賦】潰濩泧漷。　又【集韻】胡隈切，音回。義同。　又戸代切，音?。與瀣同。　又胡骨切，音搰。決也。

(5) Destroyed.

(7) Bad.

[Note] The next decision said collapse.　It's messy again. 【Poetry·Daya】Usually collapsed.　It's scattered again. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Three Years] The people flee from it and said they collapsed. [Gongyang Biography] The country is called collapse, and the city is called rebellion.　 Then again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】It's not overwhelming.　I'm angry again. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】There are some slumps and some collapses. 【Han Poem】Broken, bad appearance.　The water intersects again and then it is collapsed. [Song Yu·Gao Tang Fu] Fell and enter.　It's collapsed again, and the water has a sharp look. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The sacred river was broken.　[Jiyun] Hu Kuma cut, sound back. The same meaning.　And cut on behalf of the other, sound?. The same as Zong.　I cut my bones again, and sound distressed. Definitely.
